roleset.name: impelled action, giving courage to do something

example.name: encourage-v: actor and action
example.text: In anticipation of that shift, he and other analysts are encouraging their clients to buy such issues now.

example.name: encouragement-n: args 0, 2
example.text: f it wasn't for their encouragement to keep going, I don't know where I would be."

example.name: encouragement-n: just arg2
example.text: It just gives gentle encouragement to put his head down and round the back.
example.arg: to put his head down and round the back.

example.name: encouragement-n: args 0, 1
example.text: Blake Forslund Sr. remembered for his encouragement to others, love of community

example.name: encouragement-n: all args
example.text: 1650s, from Hector (n.), in reference to his encouragement of his fellow Trojans to keep up the fight.

example.name: courage-n
example.text: Jimmy Carter's courage in the face of cancer.

example.name: take_courage-l
example.text: He took courage in the sight and found new strength.

roleset.note: ENCOURAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encourage' based on financial subcorpus. Comparison with convince. Member of VNcls force-59, advise-37.9. (from encourage.01-v)
ENCOURAGEMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, encourage.01. Corresponds to VNcls advise-37.9, amuse-31.1, force-59. (from encouragement.01-n)
ENCOURAGING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from encouraging.01-j)

roleset.name: provide favorable conditions for growth; promote

example.name: encourage-v: transitive
example.text: This is one of the first bids under [new takeover rules]-1 aimed at *trace*-1 encouraging open bids instead of gradual accumulation of large stakes.
example.arg: open bids instead of gradual accumulation of large stakes.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Then he will be able to encourage others with teaching that is true and right .
example.arg: with teaching that is true and right

example.name: encouraging-j
example.text: It 's encouraging that some on the council -- Cnare and Bidar - Sielaff -- are working toward defining ethical boundaries , but it 's amazing that it has n't been done sooner .
example.arg: some on the council -- Cnare and Bidar - Sielaff -- are working toward defining ethical boundaries

example.name: encouragement-n: providing favorable conditions for growth
example.text: Historians pointed out that Hoover's embrace of voluntarism, his faith in social science expertise, and his encouragement of cooperation between and among different segments of the American economic order was rooted not in heartless and reactionary conservatism but in the progressive social thought of his time.
example.arg: of cooperation between and among different segments of the American economic order

example.name: encouragement-n: another
example.text: The historian, with his encouragement of 'unbridled wickedness', is a hopeless horseman compared to the poet, who knows how to 'rein' his imagination with

roleset.note: ENCOURAGE-V NOTES: Adjectival "encouraging" based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1, accept-77, promote-102. (from encourage.02-v)
ENCOURAGEMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, encourage.02. Corresponds to VNcls promote-102, accept-77. (from encouragement.02-n)
ENCOURAGING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from encouraging.02-j)
